title: 110_hr3650
content: North Korean Counterterrorism and Nonproliferation Act - Provides for the continuation of restrictions against the government of North Korea unless the President certifies to Congress that North Korea has met certain benchmarks respecting: (1) missile or nuclear technology transfers. (2) support of terrorist groups and terrorist activities, (3) counterfeiting of US currency, (4) release of South Korean POWs, Japanese journalists, and Kim Donk-Shik, and (5) Bureau 39's closure.
